persona.quote: A menu easy to cook/process - healthy and quick.
behavior_and_habits: Started eating power meals at home to avoid low-quality food
Prefers healthy and quick meal options
Engages in online discussions about social issues and food quality
Has experienced corruption and bribery firsthand
frustrations: Corruption and bribery in the system
Presence of unwanted ingredients like palm oil in meals
goals_and_needs: To have access to healthy and quick meal options
To avoid corruption and bribery in daily life
To find reliable and trustworthy sources of food and information
